segments.text: Oh my god, the sink is flooding the entire counter!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely zoned out, polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's splashing down onto the floor in a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepping in it without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at that boy, climbing on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's leaning back so far; he could topple over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is in the cookie jar, grabbing as many as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, excited for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden; who would guess the inside turmoil?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to end badly if someone doesn't stop it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're all so unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron on the mom looks so out of place in this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a shocking scene of everyday disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes might get knocked over too.
segments.speaker: PAR
